channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2 Bodies Found in JetBlue Plane’s Landing Gear at Fort Lauderdale Airport
item.description: A routine post-flight inspection revealed two bodies in the landing gear compartment of a JetBlue plane after a flight from New York on Monday, the ai...

item.title: Jean-Marie Le Pen, Rabble-Rousing Leader of French Far Right, Dies at 96
item.description: He ran unsuccessfully for the French presidency five times, riding waves of discontent and xenophobia as the leader of the National Front party.

item.title: Trump Asks Appeals Court to Freeze His New York Criminal Sentencing
item.description: President-elect Donald J. Trump is trying to expunge his conviction before he is inaugurated. He would be the first felon elected to the Oval Office.

item.title: Thandiswa Mazwai Is the Voice of South Africa’s First Post-Apartheid Generation
item.description: Thandiswa Mazwai has sung of South Africa’s highs and lows since the country became a multiracial democracy 30 years ago. “My calling is to sing the p...

item.title: McDonald’s just gave the value menu its biggest shakeup in years
What Is the U.K. ‘Grooming Gang’ Scandal Seized On by Elon Musk?
item.description: The billionaire tech mogul has been posting on his social media platform about a decade-old child sex abuse scandal in Britain. Here’s what to know.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg takes a cue from Elon Musk: Facebook and Instagram will ditch fact-checking and instead rely on community notes
item.description: The Meta CEO announced changes to content moderation just in time for a familiar incoming presidential administration.

item.title: For Many Returning Russian Veterans, a Long Road of Recovery Awaits
item.description: A large number of soldiers return as amputees, and many suffer from post-traumatic stress disorder. Once home, they face stigma and a grueling course ...

item.title: Golden Globes Ratings Decline Slightly to 9.3 Million Viewers
item.description: The show on Sunday averaged 9.3 million viewers, down from 9.4 million the year before.

item.title: Millions will get higher Social Security benefits after Biden signs ‘fairness’ bill
item.description: "Americans who have worked hard all their lives to earn an honest living should be able to retire with economic security and dignity," Biden said.
